question: “A rolling stone gathers no moss” The complex form of the sentence is-
optionA: Since a stone is rolling, it gathers no moss.
optionB: Though a stone rolls, it gathers no moss.
optionC: A stone that rolls gathers no moss.
optionD: A stone what rolls gathers no moss.
